title: Glitter (2001) 720p Rifftrax 6ch 2ch
description:
Glitter.2001.720p.Rifftrax.6ch.2ch.mkv

DEFAULT AUDIO IS TRACK1 MOVIE PLUS RIFFTRAX
FOR MOVIE ONLY SOUND SWITCH TO TRACK2 FOR 5.1 OR TRACK3 FOR 2.0

Glitter (2001)
video: 1280x528 AVC
audio1 (default): movie plus Rifftrax AAC 2.0
audio2: just movie AAC 5.1
audio3: just movie AAC 2.0
subs: English built in, off by default, not hard coded, software switchable
intro: 1s after the last riff comment
Rifftrax released 2007.05.21 1h46m09s 2,465,142,234bytes

This is a remux with the Rifftrax commentary added as the default audio track. The Rifftrax audio track has been newly remastered to ensure the riff comments are just loud enough to be clear when the movie is loud and not too loud when the movie is quiet. Please leave any feedback regarding the Rifftrax audio remastering.

Note for the Rifftrax audio track - audio1, 2.0 Riff - DisembAudio's singing during the credits pushed the Rifftrax intro comments longer than the video running time. The picture just displays the movie company logo during this final audio part.

Big thanks to the posters of the subs and the chapters. A very, very special thanks to the poster of the 720p/5.1 of the movie - thank you!

If this Rifftrax was enjoyable, you haven't paid for it and you have a few dollars to spare, please consider purchasing this riff (3.99USD) or make a general donation (5USD and up) - they take Bitcoin now too
